website_summaries.verdict: Although Captain America’s Nerf shield is a bit pricy, it was perfectly made for kid-sized arms and wrists, which makes playing Avengers even more fun.
pros: Press star to reveal pair of dart blasters hidden behind shield

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this Captain America shield/nerf gun. I was hesistant to purchase it as there are reviews saying that it is too hard to shoot. My son has had no issues with making this into a shield, transforming it and shooting the nerf darts out of it. There is a slide on the shield that makes it into the shield then you push down the star to open the shield back up. For the nerf gun, you load the darts, pull back on the handle, aim and shoot. I definitely recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Shield
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and after reading the reviews I figured out how to correctly shoot the shield and haven't had issues since. The manufacturer should change the instructions as they are misleading on how you shoot the shield. Otherwise it has held up to lots of playtime and he even sleeps with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dareth Goulding

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fire nerf bullets, but my kid loves the shield action
customer_reviews.text: It's not working, but my kid loves the shield action so much he won't let me return it. At least not today.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 yr old's birthday & kicking myself for not reading the reviews. The thing will not shoot & we tried everything. VERY DISAPPOINTING. I was hoping this was along the lines of the Iron Man blaster that has a similar reveal function which works great. But this was a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the Birthday Party
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew loved this and spent hours playing with it, Seemed to be a hit with his friends too as I heard some of them asking their parents if they could get one,
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Wrona

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: We’ll Build! My son loved it! It’s was big hit at his school with the super hero day!
customer_reviews.author: Luis C

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old Captain
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. Shoots relatively well and is a really cool concept. He's played rough with it for a few weeks and it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Beej

customer_reviews.title: ... was a Christmas gift for my nephew an he loved it. Although the trigger is a little tricky ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my nephew an he loved it. Although the trigger is a little tricky but he managed to figure it out. Overall he liked it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little Christmas Present!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old godson for Christmas. He loves superheros and didn't have a nerf gun yet, so I figured this would be a perfect first nerf gun (since it only shoots two bullets at a time). He was SO excited when he opened this and has been running around the house with it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Hea Hea

customer_reviews.title: Trigger can be tricky
customer_reviews.text: Almost returned ours right after we opened if on Christmas day but after sticking a pen in the release we were able to get the trigger to work. The piece to fire the rockets can get stuck so just take the handle off and use something small to release it and it should work again without problem.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Chance

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday. The trigger didn’t work at first but after pushing the handle into the shield pretty hard it started making the connection. The biggest complaint is that if you hold it by the handle and pull the rod back to load it the handle pulls free from the shield and then needs to be put back together. Super faulty concept
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: If it works its fine
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for cousins and our boys for Christmas; one didn't work at all, and one works intermittently. They accepted a return and sent a new item. Overall they look better than they work. I have had three returns now on Nerf guns, so I'm pretty much done wasting time on buying them, quality is too iffy.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Thieme

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Never worked right. The trigger won't shhot, we have to hit the pull in the back to launch the bullets.
customer_reviews.author: ELLIE F

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. Shoots a good distance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew age 3. He loved it. Shoots a good distance. Recommend buying additional ammo.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: We have this to my nephew for his birthday. This was the hit gift of the party along with a cape and mask. My nephew is 5 and he was able to figure out how to use this. It was just like described in the ad. Looked good and functioned good also. And of course he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: My kids love how cool it looks but it’s near impossible to shoot. They never play with it because they can’t get it to shoot 9 out of 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: richard jackson

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: It really surprised my son, because duh its Captain America, I as well was pretty excited about the toy, but the handle doesn't really stay latched onto the shield. and the shield can adjust to a full circle but the star button got stuck plenty of times. I'm not sure if I got a defected one. but id just be careful while using this toy because the shield will fly out of your hands if the handle comes off
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Robles

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time getting handle on the correct way, definitely had to force it. Hasn't come out though, so that's a plus. Fun little toy that my husband and i enjoy after the short people have fallen asleep. Great toy, would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Batty

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it thinking it was broken but when the second one arrived, it’s the same . The lever is very hard to pull and the handle keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Moran

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome construction but shooting capability not quite good. Since you have to attach the grip to shoot it, the mechanism isn't quite as sound. Requires a lot of pressure to pull the trigger to shoot. But as a shield and cool swooshing opening action, the kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: ninjin_desu

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This shield is awesome! My son (6) loves it! He loves to run around pretending he is Captain America and shooting the bad guys. He loves that he can put the shield up and quickly push the button down to take the shield down. I highly recommend this. It's super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amy in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and unusable
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted this for his birthday after playing with his cousin's. Unfortunately, after finding and buying one for him, it doesn't even shoot the bullets. So I basically gave him a $50 broken toy for his Birthday. We weren't able to return the item within the window because I ordered it in advance and by the time he opened it, the return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this less then 1 star I would. My son got this for Christmas and my husband threw all the boxes away before making sure everything worked. It doesn’t shoot the darts unless you manually push the loader lever.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't fire the foam bullets. From the way it acted, the firing mechanism inside was reversed. A complete let down.
customer_reviews.author: La Femme Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my 9 yr old grandson, who loves it! Works as it should, although I was a bit surprised that it would s as small as it is. I expected it to be bigger, but he loves it and that’s what counts.
customer_reviews.author: Clulo

customer_reviews.title: Small but fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 yr old and he loves it. Smaller then expected but still great and perfect for him . My 5 in half yr old plays with it to and its almost to small for him
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Padron-Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's birthday-he turned 7. He loved it and I think his Dad loved it more. They had a "blast" with it.
customer_reviews.author: KDePuy22

customer_reviews.title: Was broken when we bought it but it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Was broken when we bought it but it was a Christmas present and wasn’t opened right away. By the time my son opened it, it was too late to return. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kid for Easter and product is broken. Doesn’t shoot and pieces were shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkann90

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it. It is easy enough to load and fire. My 3 1/2 yr old can also do it on his own. (Buy extra nerph bullets though) It's not super durable, I mean it's plastic but I knew what I was buying. Wish the price was lower, but we got it anyway as it was requested. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Captain America shield
customer_reviews.text: Both my grandsons love captain America they love this shield. Kids can work the blaster without any problems. The kids are 3 and 5 years old
customer_reviews.author: Connie Haag

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son at christmas- it was broken out of the box. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: CA shield blaster
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at first but after we took it apart and put it back together it worked great. 4 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: BrookeM1

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these products. Only one worked! The others jammed on first use. Very frustrating. I returned the three that did not work to Amazon but I only received credit for one!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moreno

customer_reviews.title: For any superhero lover
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as part of my sons captain america costume for his 4th birthday party. He absolutely loved it! Darts shoot out super fast tho!
customer_reviews.author: MakeupartistJen22

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy if able to pull handle!
customer_reviews.text: This is s replacement. First one purchased was a gift from a neighbor. It jammed with in s week and was useless. So I purchased this one. Hopefully this will work better. Not for children under 5 to hard to pull and make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Loris

customer_reviews.title: For the hero lover in us all
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 yr old son and he loves it, plays with it all the time

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year for my stepson and he loved it! It works well. And the packaging was good.
customer_reviews.author: Deej Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas. Seems like a good quality toy for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cropek

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend, in the UK , he loved it he had never seen one like that before. My son bought it for his friend in the UK.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know I gave it to my grandson as a gift

customer_reviews.title: does not work, waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Bought two and neither works. Double-checked instructions and even watched videos to figure out how to shoot the nerf bullets and nothing worked. Will definitely return these.

customer_reviews.title: The handle could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The handle is a chore and not kid proof. The firing sequence is a little strange and could be easier.

customer_reviews.text: My son loves Captain America so this was a great gift. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: and it's pretty complicated you shoot
customer_reviews.text: The nerf darts fall out if held the wrong way, and it's pretty complicated you shoot. Once mastered the boys had fun.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and my kiddo loves it but the bullets ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cool and my kiddo loves it but the bullets shoot really fast and the shield is opened by pressing the star in the front so every time my kiddo bumps it or sets it down, the shield opens up

customer_reviews.title: it’s very sturdy and well made

customer_reviews.title: More complicated to use than it should be
customer_reviews.text: It's a little unwieldy and both bullets shoot out at once when you pull the trigger (which is really easy to do). However it's easy to cock again and my son likes it, except for the shooting aspect.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift

customer_reviews.text: It's nerf, it works. Lots of fun for nerf wars.

customer_reviews.title: Irritating to parents
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it !! But it jams a lot and we have to put the handle back on a lot. Irritating to parents and kids. But they love it so much we deal. I wont buy another one.

customer_reviews.title: Nerf name not nerf quality
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought, hard to make sure the hold bar is in place. Once together it shoots ok. Not as good as a typical Nerf gun.

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely satisfied. This doesn't just look cool, but it actually is the coolest toy my son has now that my husband just has to play with. My son is 4 and the toy functions are easy for him to do.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my 5 year old!

product_meta.title: Marvel Captain America Blaster Reveal Shield
product_meta.description: Captain America fights for battle victory with superhuman strength, agility, and an indestructible shield! He's America's first Super Soldier, fighting fearlessly on the side of justice. Kids can imagine what it's like to battle like Captain America with this Blaster Reveal Shield, which includes 2 launching projectiles! Just push down the star button to watch the shield open, revealing a hidden blaster designed to take enemies down! Heroes-in-training can also use the shield as protection, and when they reveal the blaster, they'll have the ultimate weapon! Copyright 2016 Marvel. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Push star button to reveal blaster
Launch 2 NERF darts using blaster reveal feature
Includes Blaster Reveal Shield, 2 NERF darts, and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
